mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) NUM, NATIVELANGUAGE.*FROM NATIVELANGUAGE WHERE ${param2} LIKE '%${param3}%') A WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1+(#{param1}-1)*10 AND #{param1}*10
